title: I have a defective display
content:
this problem is progressing.

first stage:
flashes when switching to always on display.

turn off AON and move on.

second phase:
the "screen shake" starts just in working order.

helps to unscrew the brightness to the maximum.

third stage:
eerie green flashes start all over the screen.

nothing helps here.
just turn off the phone for a few hours.

_

looks like a screen marriage.
